description: This is a new Air-Loc 18x6.50-8, 18x7.50-8 multi-fitment ATV / Lawn and Garden / Golf Cart tire inner tube. It is a multi-fit tube that is made to be used in the following sizes:
The most common applications are for ATV, Lawn Mower and Golf Cart tires. This tube has a standard TR13 short rubber valve stem.

This inner tube is made from a brand new Butyl rubber. Made with premium-quality, heavy-duty rubber, these inner tubes are highly durable and ideal for home, professional and commercial and industrial use.

Usable with lawn mowers / tractors, hand trucks, wheelbarrows, garden / utility / flat carts, yard trailers, dollies, trolleys, wagons, generators, snow blowers, pressure washers, air compressors, wood chippers and more.
